Minor bug fixes.

Thanks for all that you create.
- Adobe Spark Video Team

Today marks the next chapter for Spark Video: you can now add video clips to your story!

You’ve told us you love the ease of using images, words and icons to create engaging videos. But the #1 requested feature? To harness the power of video within the simplicity of Spark to communicate with even greater impact. And now it’s here.

· Trim: One-touch trimming lets you pick the right start and end of the clip you want in your video.

· Continue clip: Unlike complicated video editors, your clip can easily be parsed into a series of slides of various durations. To make a new point over the same video clip, simply break it up into a new slide by tapping the “Continue” button. Then overlay text, an icon, adjust the volume, or add narration to the slides—it will play seamlessly.

· Adjust volume: Add a music track to lend an overall mood to your video. Then highlight key moments of sound from your clips or narration to engage your audience. Sounds from your clips can be set as ambient background, emphasized, or muted.

· Align video to narration: We’ll automatically align the video clip to the length of your narration. No guesswork needed.

We can’t wait to see what you create!
Team Spark

We've loved watching your stories move with video clips. We now include the duration of your video clip as you trim, and visually indicate clips that have been continued across multiple slides.

We can't wait to see what you create!
- The Adobe Spark Team

Spark Video now supports native upload to Facebook. Post videos directly to your Timeline so that they autoplay in the Facebook News Feed.

Thanks for all that you create!
- The Adobe Spark Team

Spark Video now supports native upload to Facebook Pages.

Thanks for all that you create!

Minor bug fixes.

Thanks for all that you create!
- The Adobe Spark Team

We’re in awe of the stunning video stories you’ve created with Spark Video and today, we’re excited to introduce a set of new features to help you take your content to the next level.

NEW THEMES: Give your videos a fresh and modern feel with a collection of new themes, with new colors, fonts, and motion.
UPDATED LAYOUTS: We’ve redesigned layouts to help your content stand out.
DRAGGABLE TEXT: Now you can tap, hold, and drag your text to the perfect spot.

And we didn’t stop there. Beyond beautiful, professional-looking content, we know that branding is what helps you stand out from the crowd and sets your business, cause, or passion project apart. That’s why we’re releasing the new Spark with premium features (in app purchase).

Although Spark as you know it will remain free, upgrading to Spark with premium features will allow you to customize your content with your logo, colors, and curated font pairings. Watch your brand come to life in seconds!

Spark with premium features lets you:
REMOVE AND REPLACE THE ADOBE SPARK LOGO: Remove the Spark brand from your video and outro and add your own.
ADD YOUR OWN BRAND INGREDIENTS: Easily add your logo, colors, and select a font to make your brand shine.
GET YOUR OWN THEMES: Choose from personalized video themes and make one-click updates across your projects.
CREATE BRANDED GRAPHICS AND WEBPAGES TOO: Use Adobe Spark on the web or download iOS apps Spark Post to create branded social graphics, and Spark Page to create branded webpages

Subscriptions to Adobe Spark with premium features is part of your active Creative Cloud subscription or US$9.99/month as a standalone app.

If you like Spark Video, help us spread the word by leaving a nice review. We really appreciate it! You can also tag your awesome Video creations with #AdobeSpark for a chance to be featured.

We can’t wait to see what you create!

- The Adobe Spark Team

Spark Video now supports Live Photos! Access your moving images from the Live Photos Album or the Camera Roll. Live photos will be imported as 3 second video clips.
As part of this release, Spark Video now requires iOS 10 or newer. If you haven't already, please update your iPad or iPhone for the best experience.

Thanks for all that your create.
Adobe Spark Team

Square video is here! In the age of precious real estate on social feeds, a social video will help your message stand out.

In this release, we've added:

SQUARE VIDEO: Easily resize your video between widescreen and square. Watch as all your content seamlessly adapts to that new aspect ratio in just one tap!

DRAGGABLE TEXT SUPPORT: Drag and reposition your text to nine different places across any layout, including Caption and Split Screen. New guidelines show you exactly where your text can go. Now you can align your text left, right, center, up, down and all around.

Thanks for all that you create!
Team Spark

Minor bug fixes.

Thanks for all that you create.
Adobe Spark Team

Add your own custom fonts!
Exclusively for Spark Premium users. You can now add your own fonts to express your unique brand personality! To get started, simply upload your custom font file to your brand manager on spark.adobe.com and easily apply them to your custom themes.

Thanks for all that you create.
Adobe Spark Team

Add your own custom fonts!
Exclusively for Spark Premium users. You can now add your own fonts to express your unique brand personality! To get started, simply upload your custom font file to your brand manager on spark.adobe.com and easily apply them to your custom themes.

Thanks for all that you create.
Adobe Spark Team

NEW!

You’ve asked, and we’ve listened! Adjusting Text Size is now available!
●Now you can adjust the text size in your Spark Video projects, giving your more ways to express your ideas! When you add text to a slide, you’ll now see controls to increase or decrease the text size.
●Have something big and bold to say? Add text in capital letters and increase the font size to make it stand out.
● If you are adding text over a photo or video, try decreasing the font size and dragging the text in different areas in the frame so your content doesn’t get blocked.

Google Drive Integration
●Now you can connect to your Google Drive account to add photos to your projects.

Thanks for all that you create.
Adobe Spark Team

NEW!
You’ve asked, and we’ve listened! Adjusting Text Size is now available!
●Now you can adjust the text size in your Spark Video projects, giving your more ways to express your ideas! When you add text to a slide, you’ll now see controls to increase or decrease the text size.
●Have something big and bold to say? Add text in capital letters and increase the font size to make it stand out.
● If you are adding text over a photo or video, try decreasing the font size and dragging the text in different areas in the frame so your content doesn’t get blocked.

Google Drive Integration
●Now you can connect to your Google Drive account to add photos to your projects.

Thanks for all that you create.
Adobe Spark Team

NEW!

We have a shiny new theme called Tidal!
● Tidal includes a new animation style that looks great with text - watch as your messages and ideas animate in and out!
● Add a playful and polished look to your video by adding an icon and text in the caption layout
● Try the split screen layout and add your latest and greatest photos and watch as they animate in with a brand new transition style
● Expressive and fun theme colors – in the editor, tap the wand icon (iPhone) or “Themes” (iPad) and then tap Tidal to see all the available colors
● Easily adjust the font size of your text by tapping on the increase or decrease buttons

Create a new project today and give Tidal a whirl! Don’t forget to tag your posts with #adobespark or @adobespark on social so we can see all the fun things you create!

Thanks for all that you create.
Adobe Spark Team

New: Add multiple photos during project set-up!

When you start a new project, tap on “start with my photos”, select the photos of your choosing, and voila each photo is on its own separate slide! (iPhone only)

From there you can continue to use all the great features of Spark Video like choosing a theme and color that fits your style, and then adding text to give it your own unique voice. Finish it off by choosing a song that fits the mood and you are good to go!

Don’t forget to tag your posts with #adobespark or @adobespark on social so we can see all the fun things you create!

Thanks for all that you create.
Adobe Spark Team

New: Import photos and music through iCloud Files
 
We now support iCloud - you can use iCloud Files to add photos and music stored locally or in cloud (iCloud Drive or any supported cloud storage service) to your video projects!
 
Don’t forget to tag your posts with #adobespark or @adobespark on social so we can see all the fun things you create!
 
Thanks for all that you create.
Adobe Spark Team

iPad users rejoice, you can now work in landscape mode! Rotate your iPad sideways, and you’ll see more of your slides in view so you can easily re-order moments, add slides and more.

Don’t forget to tag your posts with #adobespark or @adobespark on social so we can see all the fun things you create!

NEW: Multiple Brands!
You can now create multiple brands in Spark to express yourself across all your products, clients, and side hustles!

Setup is easy – simply log on to spark.adobe.com on your desktop to create new brands. Then, you can access all your brand assets wherever you go – on the web or your mobile device.

Happy 2020!

Thanks for all that you create.
Adobe Spark Team

You can now copy and paste photos into your videos. And on an iPad with multitasking, you can drag and drop photos or text from another app, such as a web browser. Try it, you’ll like it!

You'll also notice that the Spark app has a new red icon! Our bold new color helps us stay in sync across the Adobe brand family of products."

Thanks for all that you create,
Adobe Spark Team

NEW: Access Your Shared Brands!

We know how important using the right branded elements is to create consistent and stand-out designs. Using Shared Brands, you and your entire team can easily create on-brand content with your team’s logos, colors and fonts—now accessible directly in the app under the Brand Switcher.

Thanks for all that you create.
Adobe Spark Team

4.3.0
NEW: Access Your Shared Brands!

We know how important using the right branded elements is to create consistent and stand-out designs. Using Shared Brands, you and your entire team can easily create on-brand content with your team’s logos, colors and fonts—now accessible directly in the app under the Brand Switcher.
